snippet: Britain's Andy Murray set up a meeting with Argentina's Juan Martin del Potro in the Olympics men's tennis final on Sunday, as he aims to become the first player to retain the singles title....
lead_paragraph: Britain's Andy Murray set up a meeting with Argentina's Juan Martin del Potro in the Olympics men's tennis final on Sunday, as he aims to become the first player to retain the singles title.

headline.print_headline: Murray Set for Historic Match, Puig Wins First Gold for Puerto Rico
headline.main: Murray Set for Historic Match, Puig Wins First Gold for Puerto Rico
